entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tulita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tulita Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -40.3°C
Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -44.1°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:53 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:53 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:53 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
